product_name: New Balance W680v2 Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're a beginner or a veteran, these women's running shoes offer comfortable and well-cusioned performance to keep you going strong at mile 1 or mile 10--and beyond.
